subject: Thankfully I found this group
msgSnippet: I have a question, however basic, for those in the know.  I recently began working in a JAVA based environment which will begin to utilize JUnit for testing.
messageBody:
I have a question, however basic, for those in the know. I recently
began working in a JAVA based environment which will begin to
utilize JUnit for testing. I will be using IntelliJ IDEA to write
my code.

I cannot find basic instructions anywhere in regard to kicking off
JUnit and utilizing it's graphic interface to enter my suite
information and run my tests.

The first set of tests will be to verify items on a web page and do
simple navigation.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

scott.hamilton@...
